title: A Dictionary of Gods and Goddesses, Devils and Demons 2015 [ePub
description: Containing around 1,800 entries this Dictionary covers, in one volume, all the important deities and demons from around the world. The gods of ancient mythology appear alongside the gods of contemporary religion, and `lesser' mythologies and religions are also fully covered. The author provides an extensive network of cross-references, allowing the reader to draw cross-cultural comparisons. The Dictionary will be an invaluable source of information for anyone interested in comparative religion or the diversity of religious views throughout the world. Print Length: 458 pages Page Numbers Source ISBN: 0710211066 Simultaneous Device Usage: Up to 4 simultaneous devices, per publisher limits Publisher: Routledge; New Ed edition (29 April 2015) Sold by: Amazon Media EU S.à r.l. Language: English ASIN: B00WUFB69W https://www.amazon.co.uk/Dictionary-Gods-Goddesses-Devils-Demons-ebook/dp/B00WUFB69W/
